Sentencas: This paper focuses on novel integration of high temperature solid oxide fuel cell coupled with recuperative gas turbine (with air-film cooling of blades) based hybrid power plant (SOFC-blade cooled GT).
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: For realistic analysis of gas turbine cycle air-film blade cooling technique has been adopted.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: First law thermodynamic analysis investigating the combine effect of film cooling of blades, SOFC, applied to a recuperated gas turbine cycle has been reported.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Thermodynamic modeling for the proposed cycle has been presented.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Results highlight the influence of film cooling of blades and operating parameters of SOFC on various performance of SOFC-blade cooled GT based hybrid power plant.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Moreover, parametric investigation has also been done to examine the effect of compressor pressure ratio, turbine inlet temperature, on hybrid plant efficiency and plant specific work.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: It has been found that on increasing turbine inlet temperature (TIT) beyond a certain limit, the efficiency of gas turbine starts declining after reaching an optimum value which is compensated by continuous increase in SOFC efficiency with increase in operating temperature.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: The net result is higher performance of hybrid cycle with increase in maximum cycle temperature.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, it has been observed that at TIT 1600 K and compression ratio 20, maximum efficiency of 73.46% can been achieved.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of advanced SOFC-blade cooled gas turbine hybrid cycle
